availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Taliaferro (Hopkins County, Kentucky, tavern keeper and justice of the peace)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, tavern keeper and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth E. Pratt Taliaferro in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on November 1, 1859. Resident of Hopkins County in 1860. Tavern keeper in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1863. Justice of the peace in Hopkins County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 114.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 157.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 147-8.
KYR-0001-007-0385.
